Package index

All functions

LRObj-class lrbject
Run and Generate all LR Downstream analysis
analise_LR()
Run all LR Downstream analysis
create_diff_table()
Read the lrobject and generate the comparative tables
generate_report()
Run all LR Downstream analysis
make_report()
Generate a report for given LRObj
plot_Heatmap()
This function generates the graph adjacency matrix Heatmap
plot_Volcano()
This function generates the enhancedVolcanoplot
plot_bar_rankings()
This function generates the barplot for a given network ranking on the CGI level. Further, the genes can be filtered by selected gene types to filter the plot.
plot_cci()
Plot Cell Cell Interaction
plot_deregulated_pathways()
This function is a proxy to the PCA plot in comparative conditions
plot_graph_sankey_tf()
This function creates a sankey plot for a selected gene including transcription factor interactions.
plot_pca()
This function is a proxy to the PCA plot
plot_pca_LR_comparative()
This function is a proxy to the PCA plot in comparative conditions
plot_sankey()
This function plots a sankey plot for selected genes or cell types
read_lr_single_condition()
Read single condition tables
set_coords()
This function assigns coordinates in the sankey plots for the genes on the dataframe
